topics.author: 50c204917f123b31440000a5

topics.body:
I hate FNAF. I suffer from a form of OCD and the most random thing can obesess me. When I saw a gameplay of FNAF, I coudln't sleep for 48 hours (no joking), afraid of nightmares.

However, that a 31-year old can get startled shitless from it gets to prove FNAF is a masterpiece of horror. Universally. And from such a simple idea. So it's a mix of hate and admiration.

NOTE: I don't like furry cosplays nor clowns, either.
